refnamediv.refpurpose: Descriptors for the various DVB specifications

refsect1.title: Object Hierarchy
refsect1.screen: GEnum ├── GstMpegtsCableOuterFECScheme ├── GstMpegtsDVBCodeRate ├── GstMpegtsDVBServiceType ├── GstMpegtsModulationType ├── GstMpegtsSatellitePolarizationType ╰── GstMpegtsSatelliteRolloff

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_content ()
refsect2.para: Extracts the DVB content information from descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_component ()
refsect2.para: Extracts the DVB component information from descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if parsing succeeded, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_extended_event ()
refsect2.para: Extracts the DVB extended event information from descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if parsing succeeded, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_satellite_delivery_system ()
refsect2.para: Extracts the satellite delivery system information from descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if parsing succeeded, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_cable_delivery_system ()
refsect2.para: Extracts the cable delivery system information from descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if parsing succeeded, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_terrestrial_delivery_system ()
refsect2.para: Parses out the terrestrial delivery system from the descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_t2_delivery_system ()
refsect2.para: Parses out the DVB-T2 delivery system from the descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_short_event ()
refsect2.para: Extracts the DVB short event information from descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if parsing succeeded, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_network_name ()
refsect2.para: Parses out the dvb network name from the descriptor :

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_from_dvb_network_name ()
refsect2.para: Creates a GstMpegtsDescriptor to be a GST_MTS_DESC_DVB_NETWORK_NAME, with the network name name . The data field of the GstMpegtsDescriptor will be allocated, and transferred to the caller.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the GstMpegtsDescriptor or NULL on fail.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_service ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_service (const GstMpegtsDescriptor *descriptor, GstMpegtsDVBServiceType *service_type, gchar **service_name, gchar **provider_name);
refsect2.para: Extracts the dvb service information from descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if parsing succeeded, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_from_dvb_service ()
refsect2.para: Fills a GstMpegtsDescriptor to be a GST_MTS_DESC_DVB_SERVICE. The data field of the GstMpegtsDescriptor will be allocated, and transferred to the caller.

entry.para: Service type defined as a GstMpegtsDVBServiceType

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the GstMpegtsDescriptor or NULL on fail.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_teletext_idx ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_teletext_idx (const GstMpegtsDescriptor *descriptor, guint idx, gchar **language_code, GstMpegtsDVBTeletextType *teletext_type, guint8 *magazine_number, guint8 *page_number);
refsect2.para: Parses teletext number idx in the descriptor . The language is in ISO639 format.

entry.para: The id of the teletext to get

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: FALSE on out-of-bounds and errors

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_teletext_nb ()
refsect2.para: Find the number of teletext entries in descriptor

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: Number of teletext entries

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_subtitling_idx ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_subtitling_idx (const GstMpegtsDescriptor *descriptor, guint idx, gchar **lang, guint8 *type, guint16 *composition_page_id, guint16 *ancillary_page_id);
refsect2.para: Extracts the DVB subtitling informatio from specific table id in descriptor .
Note: Use gst_tag_get_language_code if you want to get the the ISO 639-1 language code from the returned ISO 639-2 one.

entry.para: Table id of the entry to parse

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if parsing succeeded, else FALSE.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The number of entries in descriptor

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_from_dvb_subtitling ()
refsect2.programlisting: GstMpegtsDescriptor * gst_mpegts_descriptor_from_dvb_subtitling (const gchar *lang, guint8 type, guint16 composition, guint16 ancillary);

entry.para: a string containing the ISO639 language.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The GstMpegtsDVBLinkageMobileHandOver or NULL if an error happened

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The GstMpegtsDVBLinkageEvent or NULL if an error happened

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: an GstMpegtsDVBLinkageExtendedEvent array or NULL if an error happened.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_linkage ()
refsect2.para: Extracts the DVB linkage information from descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if parsing succeeded, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_private_data_specifier ()
refsect2.para: Parses out the private data specifier from the descriptor .

entry.para: the private data specifier id registered by http://www.dvbservices.com/.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_frequency_list ()
refsect2.para: Parses out a list of frequencies from the descriptor .

entry.para: FALSE in Hz, TRUE in kHz.
a list of all frequencies in Hz/kHz depending on offset.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_data_broadcast ()
refsect2.para: Parses out the data broadcast from the descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_scrambling ()
refsect2.para: Parses out the scrambling mode from the descriptor .

entry.para: This 8-bit field identifies the selected mode of the scrambling algorithm (GstMpegtsDVBScramblingModeType). The technical details of the scrambling algorithm are available only to bona-fide users upon signature of a Non Disclosure Agreement (NDA) administered by the DVB Common Scrambling Algorithm Custodian.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_data_broadcast_id ()
refsect2.para: Parses out the data broadcast id from the descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_parental_rating ()
refsect2.para: Extracts the DVB parental rating information from descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_stream_identifier ()
refsect2.para: Extracts the component tag from descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happended correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_ca_identifier ()
refsect2.para: Extracts ca id's from descriptor .

entry.para: a list of ca identifier. Edge entry identifies the CA system. Allocations of the value of this field are found in http://www.dvbservices.com.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_service_list ()
refsect2.para: Parses out a list of services from the descriptor :

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_stuffing ()
refsect2.para: Parses out the stuffing bytes from the descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_bouquet_name ()
refsect2.para: Extracts the bouquet name from descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if parsing succeeded, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_multilingual_network_name ()
refsect2.para: Parses out the multilingual network name from the descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_multilingual_bouquet_name ()
refsect2.para: Parses out the multilingual bouquet name from the descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_multilingual_service_name ()
refsect2.para: Parses out the multilingual service name from the descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_descriptor_parse_dvb_multilingual_component ()
refsect2.para: Parses out the multilingual component from the descriptor .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the parsing happened correctly, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: enum GstMpegtsDVBDescriptorType
refsect2.para: The type of GstMpegtsDescriptor
These values correspond to the registered descriptor type from the various DVB specifications.
Consult the relevant specifications for more details.

refsect2.title: enum GstMpegtsDVBExtendedDescriptorType
refsect2.para: The type of GstMpegtsDescriptor
These values correspond to the registered extended descriptor type from the various DVB specifications.
Consult the relevant specifications for more details.

refsect2.title: struct GstMpegtsContent
struct GstMpegtsComponentDescriptor
struct GstMpegtsExtendedEventDescriptor
refsect2.para: Extended Event Descriptor (EN 300 468 v.1.13.1)

refsect2.title: struct GstMpegtsSatelliteDeliverySystemDescriptor
refsect2.para: Satellite Delivery System Descriptor (EN 300 468 v.1.13.1)

entry.para: If TRUE, the satellite is in the eastern part of the orbit, else in the western part.
The polarization of the transmitted signal
modulation system, TRUE if DVB-S2, else DVB-S

refsect2.title: struct GstMpegtsCableDeliverySystemDescriptor
refsect2.para: Cable Delivery System Descriptor (EN 300 468 v.1.13.1)

refsect2.title: struct GstMpegtsTerrestrialDeliverySystemDescriptor
refsect2.para: Terrestrial Delivery System Descriptor (EN 300 468 v.1.13.1)

entry.para: TRUE High Priority FALSE Low Priority
TRUE no time slicing FALSE time slicing
TRUE no mpe-fec is used FALSE mpe-fec is use
TRUE more frequency are use, else not

refsect2.title: struct GstMpegtsT2DeliverySystemCellExtension

entry.para: centre frequency of the sub cell in Hz

refsect2.title: struct GstMpegtsT2DeliverySystemCell
struct GstMpegtsT2DeliverySystemDescriptor
refsect2.para: describe DVB-T2 transmissions according to EN 302 755

refsect2.title: enum GstMpegtsDVBServiceType
refsect2.para: The type of service of a channel.
As specified in Table 87 of ETSI EN 300 468 v1.13.1

refsect2.title: enum GstMpegtsDVBTeletextType
refsect2.para: The type of teletext page.
As specified in Table 100 of ETSI EN 300 468 v1.13.1

refsect2.title: enum GstMpegtsDVBLinkageType
refsect2.para: Linkage Type (EN 300 468 v.1.13.1)

refsect2.title: struct GstMpegtsDVBLinkageMobileHandOver
struct GstMpegtsDVBLinkageEvent
struct GstMpegtsDVBLinkageExtendedEvent
struct GstMpegtsDVBLinkageDescriptor
struct GstMpegtsDataBroadcastDescriptor
struct GstMpegtsDVBServiceListItem
struct GstMpegtsDvbMultilingualNetworkNameItem
refsect2.para: a multilingual network name entry

refsect2.title: struct GstMpegtsDvbMultilingualBouquetNameItem
refsect2.para: a multilingual bouquet name entry

refsect2.title: struct GstMpegtsDvbMultilingualServiceNameItem
refsect2.para: a multilingual service name entry
